experience-1.title: Digital Project Manager
experience-1.description: I provide website, social and email marketing solutions for corporate companies, fashion brands and local start-ups. I develop responsive eDMs, produce website wireframes and prototypes, design Facebook applications and optimise work processes using Node.js and Grunt. Clientele include Yellow Pages, White Pages, Whereis Maps, Choice Hotels Australasia, Brasilfit and Charleston's Fine Auctions.

experience-2.title: Email marketing Consultant
experience-2.description: Responsibilities include developing and implementing production quality email campaigns for corporate and fashion brands. I collaborate with external agencies and in house design team to develop responsive email messages, rigorously test using Litmus, and schedule according to a strict marketing calendar.

experience-3.title: SEO/SEM/SMO Consultant
experience-3.description: Monitor overall search performance for SEM and SEO campaigns. Implement search strategies and track the effectiveness of new and existing campaigns. Introduced social packages which include Facebook advertising bundles, Facebook page customisation and tab development.

experience-4.title: Sales Consultant
experience-4.description: Tailor telecommunication solutions to customer needs. Consistently achieve sales targets and KPIs through exceptional customer service.
